fields.description:
/src/java/org/apache/hadoop/mapred/AdminOperationsProtocol.java:31: cannot find symbol
    [javac] symbol  : method value()
    [javac] location: @interface org.apache.hadoop.security.KerberosInfo
    [javac] @KerberosInfo(MRJobConfig.JOB_JOBTRACKER_ID)

comments.body:
I see 0.22 jars getting pulled for core and hdfs with 0.21 build.

ivy-resolve-common:
[ivy:resolve] downloading https://repository.apache.org/content/repositories/snapshots/org/apache/hadoop/hadoop-core/0.22.0-SNAPSHOT/hadoop-core-0.22.0-20100522.005215-173.jar ...
[ivy:resolve] .............................................................................................................
[ivy:resolve] ....................................................................... (1208kB)
[ivy:resolve] .. (0kB)
[ivy:resolve]   [SUCCESSFUL ] org.apache.hadoop#hadoop-core;0.22.0-SNAPSHOT!hadoop-core.jar (3708ms)
[ivy:resolve] downloading https://repository.apache.org/content/repositories/snapshots/org/apache/hadoop/hadoop-core-test/0.22.0-SNAPSHOT/hadoop-core-test-0.22.0-20100522.005215-173.jar ...
[ivy:resolve] ............................................................................................ (606kB)
[ivy:resolve] .. (0kB)
[ivy:resolve]   [SUCCESSFUL ] org.apache.hadoop#hadoop-core-test;0.22.0-SNAPSHOT!hadoop-core-test.jar (2632ms)
[ivy:resolve] downloading https://repository.apache.org/content/repositories/snapshots/org/apache/hadoop/hadoop-hdfs/0.22.0-SNAPSHOT/hadoop-hdfs-0.22.0-20100521.215115-168.jar ...
[ivy:resolve] ..................................................................................................................................... (899kB)
[ivy:resolve] .. (0kB)
[ivy:resolve]   [SUCCESSFUL ] org.apache.hadoop#hadoop-hdfs;0.22.0-SNAPSHOT!hadoop-hdfs.jar (2127ms)
Patch to update build files to refer to 0.21.
Some changes from MAPREDUCE-1623 didn't make it in the backport - this patch includes these changes too.
I've just committed this (to the 0.21 branch).

branch 0.21 build still fails with following errors:

BUILD FAILED
/home/amarsri/workspace/branch-0.21/build.xml:1712: impossible to resolve dependencies:
        resolve failed - see output for details

I introduced some changes which I thought were breaking the 0.21 build, due to HADOOP-6600, but this JIRA isn't in 0.21, so I've reverted them. Now that http://hudson.zones.apache.org/hudson/view/Hadoop/job/Hadoop-Common-21-Build has created a correctly-named artifact, the HDFS and MapReduce 0.21 builds are working. E.g. {{ant veryclean compile}}:

{noformat}
